attributes.action: exempt low-income pensioners from paying tax on their state pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our state pension has not kept abreast of inflation - it is taxable at the end of the tax year and for low-income pensioners, this tax is most unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
